                                    java.lang.String trd_name)
                                      throws SAFSException
        The "engine" waits until the _engineRun flag is true and then begins execution.
        Overrides:

      • postNextHookTestEvent

        public int postNextHookTestEvent(java.lang.String process_name,
                        java.lang.String trd_root,
                        TestRecordData trd)
                          throws SAFSException
        Sets _engineRun = true to kickoff the "engine" execution.

        The "driver" then waits for _engineRun flag to change to indicate the "engine" is finished.

        Overrides:
        postNextHookTestEvent in class STAFHelper
        Parameters:
        process_name - -- the STAF-registered name of the engine to dispatch.
        trd_root - -- the TestRecordData SAFSVARS storage root, normally "SAFS/HOOK/".
        trd - -- the TestRecordData to place into SAFSVARS for execution by the engine.

        Returns:
        the statuscode from the call
        Throws:
        SAFSException - if staf has a problem
        See Also:
        STAFHelper.postNextHookTestEvent(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, org.safs.TestRecordData)

      • getSAFSTestRecordData

        public void getSAFSTestRecordData(java.lang.String trd_root,
                         TestRecordData trd)
        Description copied from class: STAFHelper
        Get the SAFSVARS Test Record Data into the given trd_root. The most common trd_root is "SAFS/HOOK/", which is used by all official drivers and engines. The routine does not deal with the TRD Mutex for the trd_root provided. It assumes the caller is handling the mutex.

          Gets the following record data:

        • inputrecord
        • separator
        • filename
        • linenumber
        • testlevel
        • appmapname
        • fac
        • statuscode
        • statusinfo
        Specified by:
        getSAFSTestRecordData in interface CoreInterface
        Overrides:
        getSAFSTestRecordData in class STAFHelper

      • setHookTestResultsWTimeout

        public void setHookTestResultsWTimeout(java.lang.String process_name,
                              long timeoutseconds)
                                throws SAFSException
        Prevents the posting of STAF EVENTS (RESULTS and DONE) events since everything is local in the same JVM process.

        Sets _engineRun = false to indicate the "engine" has finished processing the record and allow the "driver" to evaluate the results.

        Overrides:
        setHookTestResultsWTimeout in class STAFHelper
        Throws:
        SAFSException - if staf has a problem
        See Also:
        STAFHelper.setHookTestResultsWTimeout(java.lang.String, long)
